content:
If you need tools, you can get them from my shop,
And if your Backpack's too full, I can take those items off your hands,
And, um... you can tell me about anything that's troubling you!
The raspberries are delicious, they're absolutely wonderful! <style=SizeSmall>...I might have gotten a bit too excited there...</style>
Everyone's thoughts can be quite fascinating at times.

I heard that when the Astralink connects, goods will move along with the Lumia...
Say, wouldn't that make it a "glowing flow"? <style=SizeSmall>Get it? Because they're flowing and glowing...</style>
<size=30>If only worries could be recycled with just one click... *mumbles*</size>

But... as long as everyone has enough supplies and is happy,
I guess it's a good thing,
even if they don't need a merchant... <style=SizeSmall>right?...</style>

Okay, I'm gonna give her a special name too,
I'll call her "Esassani the Word-Whispering Wonder"!
       <size=30>D-don't tell her though...</size>

When it comes to shopping,
The perfect fit is always the best choice!
Come see what treasures we have in store today!

They say each world bubble has its own special products,
Let's explore different places,
Maybe we'll find some amazing limited-edition treasures! <style=SizeSmall>...I wonder what we'll discover...</style>

I've asked around everywhere, but couldn't find any
"Soda Pop-Pop" anywhere...
The reason is — that's not even what it's called!

Oh, you came to chat with me! That makes me happy! 
Though I still need to mind the shop... 
Let's just have a quick little chat then. <style=SizeSmall>(Multiplayer chat test - client)</style>

How am I supposed to keep these collected fish alive during transport...
       <size=30>Maybe I should ask Captain Mo about this too...</size>

And um, if you need anything at all,
just let me know~!

Yeah, I guess it might give people the wrong idea?
But you know what...
<style=SizeSmall>They say weird stuff sells better!</style>

About the Chrysovian Astralink...
I-I dream about it, but sometimes I wonder...

The most important thing about trade is...
how needs and being needed keep flowing in circles,
and how the right goods find their way to those who need them.
They might think it's poisonous...

If there really was an Astralink connecting to the heavens,
and everything could run automatically...
would they even need merchants like us anymore? <style=SizeSmall>I mean, would I be out of a job...?</style>
These lifestyle rewards can only be redeemed for goods and services provided by Loomi Co.

This was said by an amazing merchant from before.
I think it makes a lot of sense!
       <size=30>If I memorize it, it becomes mine.</size>

The common currency in the Astralink,
besides <color=#8AAB4B>Dough</color> used for trading goods,
there's also a special currency that circulates exclusively within Loomi Co.
I'm good, thanks.

It's actually called "Marble Soda,"
Only Sani calls it "Soda Pop-Pop."
     <size=30>Just like how she likes to call butterflies "flutterbees."</size>

Oh right, if your Backpack is full,
you can give your items to me for recycling,
<size=30>if only someone would bring apples to recycle...</size>

This world is simple but has its own charm... <style=SizeSmall>just like my neat little box displays...</style>
I'm thinking of making Raspberry our signature product here,
what do you think? <style=SizeSmall>Hope it stacks up to expectations...</style>
So, unlike trading with Dough, <color=#8AAB4B>Loomi</color> is more like a reward for your daily activities.
Alright! I'll have new items in stock every day! Feel free to stop by if you need anything!

...Oh! Looks like your Backpack is full?
No worries at all, I'll send everything through PuffPost!
And um, please remember to check for your delivery!

Let me tell you a secret... 
I'm planning to make some improvements based on Captain Mo's tea-making experience,
by turning them into dried fruits... <style=SizeSmall>that should... sell better, right?</style>
I have something to sell... <style=SizeSmall>All neatly stacked in their boxes, just waiting for a new home...</style>
Please come again!
...Mhm, the math checks out. Alright, I'll take these and find a good home for them. Thanks for bringing them to me. Come back anytime!

If you have any questions in life, just ask Captain Mo!
Whether it's about fine food and wine or architecture and decor,
he "knows a bit about everything" - I find that quite impressive.
I want to buy something.

Thanks for the Dough! Much appreciated!
I hope <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s yesterday, today, tomorrow,
and every single day ahead is wrapped in bundles of happiness!

H-hello there! You're <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, our contact's friend, right?
Welcome to Glenn's Stall, stop by anytime!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, what treasures did you bring today?
Let me take a peek!
I'll give you the fairest market price.

Hi there, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>! 
Glenn's Stall has some fresh 
goodies for you today!

Hi there! You're... <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, right?
Welcome to Glenn's Stall, feel free to look around.
<size=30>Now what was the next line in the guidebook supposed to be...</size>

So then, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
See anything you'd like to buy?
